releaseNotes: - Fix CredSSP rollback from setting bogus delegate computers - Fis Boxstarter.Azure dependency pins - Add ability to set the User Level Authentication Required setting when enabling RDP - Fix parsing of choco args delimiting key/values with an = sign - Use default credentials on web client downloading http scripts - Use internal function to download http gist scripts. - No longer vendors a legacy version of Chocolatey. Leverages the current beta Chocolatey library API for all Chocolatey interaction.
